svg.style: background: #ffffff; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); color-scheme: light dark;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(238, 238, 238), rgb(32, 32, 32)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(54, 57, 61), rgb(186, 189, 192));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 252px; height: 190px; padding-top: 70px; margin-left: 160px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; width: 250px; height: 190px; overflow: hidden; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; width: 100%; height: 100%; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 180px; margin-left: 167px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237));
